data.actual_result: The chat shifts up right after the app changes orientation. It doesn't happen with website embeds, only invites.
data.short_description: Rotating screen in chat when invite embeds are in sight causes the chat to make a sort of sliding animation towards the top
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a few invite links in chat. Works with only one, but effect is more noticeable when there are several invite embeds - Scroll to a point in chat where many invite embeds are visible - Rotate screen. You may need to do it repeatedly to notice it. Also you can disable transition animations in your Android developer options, it may help
